VGServer::AttributeVertexTinyBlobPolicy

VGServer::AttributeVertexTinyBlobPolicy Class Reference

AttributeVertexTinyblob is a TpAttributeBlob specialization for attribute blob containing values of just one vertex object. More...

static unsigned int realloc_size (unsigned int cap, unsigned int minnewcap)

Detailed Description

AttributeVertexTinyblob is a TpAttributeBlob specialization for attribute blob containing values of just one vertex object.

Using a different type than VertexTinyBlob gives us type checking, so we cant make copy&paste errors which mixup the two attribute arrays.
